sections.heading: of Revenue; created; Tax Commissioner; chief executive officer
sections.text: There is hereby created and established a department of state government to be known as the Department of Revenue, of which the chief executive officer shall be the Tax Commissioner.SourceLaws 1969, c. 630, ยง 1, p. 2532;R.S.1943, (1976),

77-360.Department of Revenue; created; Tax Commissioner; chief executive officer.

There is hereby created and established a department of state government to be known as the Department of Revenue, of which the chief executive officer shall be the Tax Commissioner.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 630, ยง 1, p. 2532;R.S.1943, (1976), ยง 77-340;Laws 1980, LB 834, ยง 1.
